memberdef.name: createDataset

briefdescription.para: Creates dataset of kind with guiName to the manager and returns the created dataset.

parameterdescription.para: Kind of data plugin
Name of the added dataset in the GUI
Smart pointer to the parent dataset in the data hierarchy (will add to the root of the data hierarchy if not valid)
Globally unique dataset identifier (use only for deserialization)
Whether to notify the core that a dataset is added

simplesect.para: Smart pointer to the create dataset

memberdef.name: createDatasetWithoutSelection

briefdescription.para: Creates dataset without selection of kind with guiName to the manager and returns the created dataset (this is only used fore serialization purposes)

parameterdescription.para: Kind of data plugin
Name of the added dataset in the GUI
Smart pointer to the parent dataset in the data hierarchy (will add to the root of the data hierarchy if not valid)
Globally unique dataset identifier (use only for deserialization)
Whether to notify the core that a dataset is added

simplesect.para: Smart pointer to the create dataset

memberdef.name: createDerivedDataset

briefdescription.para: Creates derived dataset from sourceDataset with guiName and returns the created derived dataset.

parameterdescription.para: GUI name for the new dataset from the core
Smart pointer to the source dataset from which this dataset will be derived
Smart pointer to the parent dataset in the data hierarchy (will attach to source dataset in hierarchy if not valid)
Whether to notify the core that a dataset is added

simplesect.para: Smart pointer to the created derived dataset

briefdescription.para: Creates a copy of selection with the sourceDataset, adds it to the manager and returns the created subset.

parameterdescription.para: Smart pointer to the selection set
Smart pointer to the source dataset
GUI name of the subset
Smart pointer to the parent dataset in the data hierarchy (will attach to source dataset in hierarchy if not valid)
Whether the new dataset is visible in the data hierarchy
Whether to notify the core that a dataset is added

simplesect.para: Smart pointer to the created subset

detaileddescription.para:
Provides storage place for:
Datasets
Raw data
Selections
Main purpose is to add, remove and retrieve datasets
